snippet: At least 228 people were arrested or received summonses on the first three nights of a four-night stand by the jam band that was to end Tuesday with a New Year’s Eve performance.
abstract: At least 228 people are arrested or given summonses on drug-related charges outside Phish concert at Madison Square Garden; band's large and obsessive following has developed reputation among law enforcement agencies for heavy drug use.

byline.original: By ELI ROSENBERG and MICHAEL SCHWIRTZ
byline.contributor: Joseph Goldstein and J. David Goodman contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: At least 228 people were arrested or received summonses on the first three nights of a four-night stand by the jam band that was to end Tuesday with a New Year’s Eve performance.

headline.main: Phish Fans Encounter Crackdown at Garden
headline.print_headline: Phish Fans Encounter Crackdown At Garden
